The claim made by Texas Right to Life ab: Dan Branch attempting to expand third-trimester abortions in Texas in 2005.
The specific amendment that Branch offer: 2005, during the consideration of Senate Bill 419 to maintain state medical regulatory agencies.
The amendment proposed by Republican Rep: Will Hartnett of Dallas, which tightened the existing state law on third-trimester abortions.
The amendment proposed by Branch: which aimed to add another exception to allow third-trimester abortions if the viable unborn child had irreversible damage to vital organs.
